name: InTime - Prototype
description:
This game is hard, 

no, there is no control map, try a different button 

yes there are bugs - framerate on Chrome is doo doo, you've been warned

A game in Development by students at Toronto Film School

Art Credits:

Player Character - https://deadrevolver.itch.io/pixel-prototype-player-sprites

Environment - Free Puzzle Platformer Kit (Pixel Art Portal Inspired Game Assets) by paweljarosz (itch.io)

Characters 

- https://miguelnero.itch.io/slimerosita

-Wizard Pack by LuizMelo (itch.io)

Icon Pack

- Shikashi's Fantasy Icons Pack (FREE) by cheekyinkling (itch.io)
